interval.description: The time interval between data points in the time series. Supported values include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', '1month'.

format.description: The format of the returned data. Can be 'json' or 'csv'. Defaults to 'json'.

time_period.description: The look-back period for the Aroon calculation. Defaults to 14.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Defaults to 30.

documentation.name: rocp
documentation.description: Calculates the Rate of Change Percentage (ROCP) for a given financial instrument over a specified time period.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supports `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Financial instrument symbol, can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

outputsize.description: Number of data points to be retrieved. Default is `30` if no date parameters are set.

time_period.description: Number of intervals used to calculate the ROCP. Default is `9`.

format.description: Format of the output data. Can be `csv` or `json`. Default is `json`.

series_type.description: The type of price series to use. Supports `open`, `high`, `low`, or `close`. Default is `close`.

documentation.name: get_place_by_ip

language.description: Specifies the language (ISO 639-1) to get the

documentation.name: oldsort
documentation.description: Fetches and sorts data from the oldsort endpoint using the given RapidAPI host and key.

referer.description: The referer to be used in the request header. Defaults to 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

documentation.name: bundesliga_standings
documentation.description: Fetches the Bundesliga standings for a given season using the provided RapidAPI key.

season.description: The specific season to fetch standings for (e.g., '2022'). If not provided, the current season standings will be fetched.

documentation.name: get_game_statistics
documentation.description: Fetches statistics for a given game using the ViperScore RapidAPI.

gameid.description: The unique identifier of the game for which the statistics are to be fetched.

documentation.name: local_weather_api
documentation.description: Fetches local weather data using the World Weather Online API.

q.description: Location query (city name, town name, or geographic coordinates).

tp.description: Time interval between weather updates (e.g., '1' for hourly updates). Defaults to None.

aqi.description: Whether to include Air Quality Index data ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'yes'.

format.description: Response format (e.g., 'json' or 'xml'). Defaults to None.

lang.description: Language for the output. Defaults to 'en'.

alerts.description: Whether to include weather alerts ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'no'.

num_of_days.description: Number of days for the weather forecast. Defaults to 3.

documentation.name: get_call
documentation.description: Fetches the API result using the given request ID.

request_id.description: The unique identifier for the API request.

documentation.name: titles_with_changed_sources
documentation.description: Fetches a listing of titles that have changed their streaming sources within a specified date range.

start_date.description: Start date to include changes from a specific date range. Format is YYYYMMDD (e.g., 20210101 for January 1st, 2021), or YYYYMMDDHHMMSS for more granular results (e.g., 20210101123459 for January 1st, 2021 12:24pm and 59 seconds). Hours are in 24-hour format and in Eastern Standard Time. Defaults to None.

limit.description: Number of titles to return per page. Default is 50, maximum is 250.

end_date.description: End date to include changes from a specific date range. Format is YYYYMMDD (e.g., 20210101 for January 1st, 2021), or YYYYMMDDHHMMSS for more granular results (e.g., 20210101123459 for January 1st, 2021 12:24pm and 59 seconds). Hours are in 24-hour format and in Eastern Standard Time. Defaults to None.

regions.description: 2-character region code (e.g., US) for the country to get titles with changed sources from. Defaults to 'US,CA'.

types.description: Filter result to include only certain types of titles. Pass a single type or multiple types comma delimited. Possible values: 'movie', 'tv_series', 'tv_special', 'tv_miniseries', 'short_film'. Defaults to 'movie,tv_series'.

page.description: Page of results to return. Defaults to 1.

documentation.name: flag_riddle
documentation.description: Flags a riddle for further review using the specified criteria.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the riddle to be flagged.

flag.description: The type of flag to be applied to the riddle (default is 0).

documentation.name: text
documentation.description: Converts the input text into a fancy text format using the Ajith Fancy Text API.

text.description: The text to be converted into fancy text.

documentation.name: double_name_medium
documentation.description: Generates a medium double name based on the provided query string.

query.description: The query string for generating the double name. Maximum length is 50 characters.

documentation.name: news_latest_page
documentation.description: Fetches the latest news stories in chronological order, filtered by the specified page ID.

page_id.description: The identifier for the specific news page to filter the stories.

documentation.name: extract
documentation.description: Extracts readable content and metadata from a given URL using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

url.description: The URL of the article to extract content and metadata from.

documentation.name: iceland_songs
documentation.description: Fetches the Iceland Songs chart information from the Billboard API for a specific date and range.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

range.description: The range of the chart information to fetch.

documentation.name: billboard_200
documentation.description: Retrieves the Billboard 200 chart for a specified date.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the Billboard 200 chart, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart positions to return (default is '1-10'). Use '1-200' to get all results.

documentation.name: independent_albums
documentation.description: Retrieves the Independent Albums chart for a specified week from the Billboard API.

week.description: The week for which to retrieve the chart, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, defaults to the previous week. If the provided date is not a Saturday, it will default to the preceding Saturday of that week.

documentation.name: time_series_endpoint
documentation.description: Retrieve historical exchange rates for specified date range and currency conversions.

start_date.description: The start date for the time series data in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

end_date.description: The end date for the time series data in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

is_from.description: Three-letter currency code of the base currency to convert from. Defaults to 'USD'.

to.description: A comma-separated list of target currency codes to convert to. Defaults to 'EUR,GBP'.

documentation.name: top_players_by_matchmaking
documentation.description: Fetch the top players by their matchmaking rank from the TrackMania API.

limit.description: The number of results to be returned. Default is `50`.

page.description: The page number for the results, each containing 50 results. Default is `0`.

documentation.name: custom_die
documentation.description: Simulates rolling a custom die with a specified number of sides using the RapidAPI service.

sides.description: The number of sides on the custom die. Default is 8.

documentation.name: stock_get_stock_profile_data
documentation.description: Fetches the stock profile data for a specified ticker symbol and region.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock (e.g., "AAPL" for Apple Inc.).

region.description: The region in which the stock is listed. Default is 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.

documentation.name: stock_get_dividends_splits
documentation.description: Fetches stock dividends and splits data for a given ticker ID using the Webull API.

tickerid.description: The ticker ID of the stock for which to fetch dividends and splits data. This is the value of the tickerId field returned from endpoints such as /stock/search, /market/get-common-ranking, /market/get-top-active, and /market/get-top-gainers.

documentation.name: mama
documentation.description: Fetches the MESA Adaptive Moving Average (MAMA) for a given instrument symbol and time interval from the Twelve Data API.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supports: `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

format.description: Response format. Supports `csv` or `json`. Default is `json`.

slow_limit.description: Slow limit parameter for MAMA calculation.

series_type.description: Type of series data. Supports: `open`, `high`, `low`, `close`. Default is `close`.

fast_limit.description: Fast limit parameter for MAMA calculation.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Default is `30` if no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum.

documentation.name: get_info_by_city
documentation.description: Fetches geographic information for a specific city, state, and country using the Zippopotamus API.

country.description: The country code (e.g., 'US' for the United States).

state.description: The state or region code within the country.

city.description: The name of the city.

documentation.name: search_emails
documentation.description: Search the web for email addresses based on a specified email domain and query.

email_domain.description: The email domain to search within (e.g., wsgr.com, gmail.com).

query.description: The search query to use, which can include names, job titles, locations, etc.

limit.description: The maximum number of emails to return. Defaults to 100. Accepts values from 1 to 5000.

top_n_keywords.description: The number of keywords to extract from each article (default is 10).

max_articles.description: The maximum number of articles to retrieve in response (default is 10).

last_n_hours.description: The time window in hours for the latest news articles (default is 48 hours).

host.description: Host string for the request header. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

documentation.name: places_v2_list_by_map

swlat.description: South West latitude of the boundary.

swlon.description: South West longitude of the boundary.

x_user_lang.description: Language for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

x_units_pressure.description: Units for pressure measurement. Allowed values are 'mbar' or 'hg'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_units_temperature.description: Units for temperature measurement. Allowed values are 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_aqi_index.description: Air Quality Index standard. Allowed values are 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_distance.description: Units for distance measurement. Allowed values are 'kilometer' or 'miles'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.

documentation.name: last_menstrual_period_lmp

documentation.name: read_text

check_word.description: The text to be checked for profanity or offensive words. Maximum length is 700 characters.
check_word.default: This example text contains no profanity / offensive word.

add.description: Comma-separated list of additional words to be added to the profanity list. Case-insensitive and accepts up to 250 characters. Defaults to None.

range.description: The level of filtering range. It can be 'low', 'mid', or 'high'. Defaults to 'low'.

r.description: The replacement string to be used for censored words. Must be a valid punctuation mark and no longer than 1 character. Defaults to '*'.

add.description: Additional text or parameters to be included.

documentation.name: email_qr_code
documentation.description: Creates and returns a static QR code encoded with the provided email address. The QR code can be customized with various design parameters such as background color, eye pattern, error correction level, size, data gradient colors, and data patterns. When scanned, the QR code will prompt the user to send an email to the specified address.

address.description: The email address to encode in the QR code.

background_color.description: The background color of the QR code. Defaults to '#FFFFFF'.

eye_pattern.description: The pattern of the QR code eyes. Defaults to 'RECT_RECT'.

error_correction.description: The error correction level of the QR code. Defaults to 'M'.

size.description: The size of the QR code. Defaults to 'm'.

data_gradient_start_color.description: The starting color for the data gradient. Defaults to '#000000'.

data_gradient_style.description: The style of the data gradient. Defaults to 'None'.

data_pattern.description: The pattern for the QR code data. Defaults to 'RECT'.

eye_color_outer.description: The outer color of the QR code eyes. Defaults to '#000000'.

data_gradient_end_color.description: The ending color for the data gradient. Defaults to '#000000'.

eye_color_inner.description: The inner color of the QR code eyes. Defaults to '#000000'.

documentation.name: convert_date
documentation.description: Convert a date to a specified calendar format using the Calendar Converter API.

to.description: The target calendar format to which the date will be converted. Possible values are:

date.description: The date to be converted, in "yyyy-mm-dd" format. Default is '1986-09-03'.

is_from.description: The calendar format of the input date. If not specified, the input date is assumed to be in Gregorian format.

is_id.description: The MyAnimeList ID of the anime.

fields.description: Comma-separated list of specific fields to retrieve data for. Available fields include '*', 'id', 'title', 'main_picture', 'start_date', 'end_data', 'synopsis', 'mean', 'rank', 'popularity', 'num_list_users', 'num_scoring_users', 'status', 'genres', 'num_episodes', 'source', 'studios', 'volume', 'chapter', 'light_novel', 'media_type', 'mal_id', 'broadcast', 'statistics', 'related_manga', 'related_anime', 'season', 'year', 'title_english', 'title_japanese', and 'synonyms'. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: originals_genres_list

documentation.name: get_all_social_spikes_by_coin_name

documentation.name: get_content

url.description: The URL of the webpage from which to extract content.

documentation.name: listoforders

e_mail.description: Email address associated with the seller account.

status.description: Status of the orders to filter.

documentation.name: get_hsn_tsn
documentation.description: Fetch HSN/TSN data for a specified car query from the HSN-TSN API.

limit.description: Number of results to return, with a maximum of 100. Defaults to 25.

offset.description: Results offset, defaults to 0.

rating.description: Limit results to those rated (y, g, pg, pg-13, or r).

documentation.name: ean13
documentation.description: Generates an EAN13 barcode as a PNG or returns an error based on a given 12-13 length code. For a 12-digit code, the check digit is automatically calculated; for a 13-digit code, the check digit is verified.

documentation.description: Search for a term using the Uncovered Treasure API and return the results.

visa_type.description: Type of visa card to generate. Defaults to 'visa'. Valid options include 'amex', 'diners', 'discover', 'jcb', 'jcb15', 'jcb16', 'maestro', 'mastercard', 'visa', 'visa13', 'visa16', 'visa19'.

documentation.name: red_colour_qr_code_generator

documentation.name: business_slogan

documentation.name: basic_search
documentation.description: Performs a basic search for movie news articles using the `/news/basic/search` endpoint.

q.description: The query term for the search, typically a keyword related to movie news.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before returning results. Default is 0.

documentation.name: v1_mortgagecalculator
documentation.description: Calculates mortgage-related information using the API Ninjas Mortgage Calculator API endpoint.

interest_rate.description: Annual interest rate (in %). For example, a 3.5% interest rate would be 3.5. Cannot exceed 10000.

downpayment.description: Downpayment on the home or asset. Cannot exceed home_value.

home_value.description: Total value of the home or asset. Must be greater than downpayment.

duration_years.description: Duration of the loan in years. Must be between 1 and 10000. If not set, default value is 30 years.

documentation.name: symbols_get_option_expirations

market.description: The market to retrieve data from. Possible values are: 'global' or 'local'.

symbol.description: The cryptocurrency symbol in the form of 'ETH<fiat>', where '<fiat>' is a valid ISO currency code (e.g., ETHUSD, ETHEUR).

documentation.name: transactions_feed

s_amount_usd.description: Filters transactions by value in USD. Use 'desc' for descending order.

size.description: Number of transactions to fetch. Defaults to '20'.

t_blockchain.description: Specifies the blockchain to filter transactions. Defaults to 'ethereum'.

lat.description: Latitude of the desired location. Must be used in conjunction with `lon`.

lat.description: Latitude in various formats like 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4. Alternatively, use the `place_id` parameter. Defaults to '37.81021'.

lat.description: Latitude in formats like "12N", "12.3N", "12.3", "13S", "13.2S", or "-13.4".

orderdirection.description: Order direction, either "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending. Defaults to "desc".

offset.description: Offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: Limit for pagination. Defaults to 50. Should be within the range 0-100.

referencecurrencyuuid.description: UUID of the reference currency whose rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to "yhjMzLPhuIDl" (US Dollar).

children_number.description: Number of children for the hotel booking. Defaults to 2.

page_number.description: Page number for paginated results. Defaults to 0.

children_ages.description: Comma-separated ages of the children. Defaults to '5,0'.

categories_filter_ids.description: IDs for filtering search categories. Defaults to 'class::2,class::4,free_cancellation::1'.

documentation.description: Fetches host language filters from the Airbnb API.

languageid.description: The LanguageId for the desired response language. To obtain a LanguageId, call the getLanguages API and use the Id.

documentation.name: webcams_list_orderby_order_sort
documentation.description: Fetches a list of webcams ordered and sorted based on the specified parameters.

sort.description: The sorting direction for the results. Possible values are "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending).

order.description: The criterion by which the results will be ordered. Possible values are:

lang.description: The language for localizing the results, if available. Default is "en".

show.description: The content to be listed in the response. Default is "webcams:image,location". Possible values include:

json.description: Specify "true" to return the result as JSON instead of plaintext. Defaults to 'True'.

documentation.name: v1_salestax
documentation.description: This function fetches sales tax breakdowns for a specified location via the API Ninjas Sales Tax API. The breakdown includes state, county, city, and any additional special sales taxes, represented in decimal form (e.g., 0.1 means 10% tax). You must specify either a ZIP code or a combination of city and state.

state.description: The name of the state for which sales tax information is required.

city.description: The name of the city for which sales tax information is required.

zip_code.description: A valid US ZIP code for which sales tax information is required. Defaults to '90210'.

offset.description: Filter on non-daylight savings offset in hours.

name.description: Filter as "contains" on timezone name in the chosen language.

code.description: Filter on 3-letter non-daylight savings timezone code (not unique).

timezone.description: Filter on timezone name in English.

daylights_offset.description: Filter on daylight savings offset in hours.

lang.description: Language selection ISO 639-1 two-letter code. Overrides the Accept-Language header. Default is 'de'.

daylights_code.description: Filter on daylight savings letter code (not unique).

fields.description: Select fields to return in the result. Default is 'offset,daylights_offset,daylights,daylights_code,timezone'.

daylights.description: Filter on daylight savings/non-daylight savings time zones (`true` or `false`).

documentation.name: carbonfootprintfromcartravel
documentation.description: Calculates the CO2 emissions in kilograms from a car journey using a specified vehicle type and distance.

consumption.description: The amount of energy consumed in kWh.

documentation.description: Calculates the CO2 equivalent (CO2e) emissions from the use of traditional hydroelectric power based on consumption and location.

consumption.description: The KWH usage of hydroelectric power.

documentation.name: validate

documentation.name: get_sender_id
documentation.description: Returns the list of all Sender IDs that are registered for the given account to send SMS.

clientid.description: The Client ID associated with the account. You can obtain the Client ID at https://app.rivet.solutions/ApiDocument/ApiDocs once your account is created.

apikey.description: The API key associated with the account. You can obtain the API key at https://app.rivet.solutions/ApiDocument/ApiDocs once your account is created.

documentation.name: sendsms
documentation.description: Sends an SMS message using the Rivet SMS service.

senderid.description: The sender ID assigned by Rivet SMS. Obtain it from https://app.rivet.solutions/Management/ManageSenderID.

clientid.description: The Rivet SMS API client ID. Obtain it from https://app.rivet.solutions/ApiDocument/ApiDocs#.

mobilenumbers.description: The recipient mobile numbers in the format '971223344566'. Multiple recipients can be specified, separated by commas. Include the country code without preceding 00 or +.

message.description: The content of the SMS message to be sent.

apikey.description: The Rivet SMS API key. Obtain it from https://app.rivet.solutions/ApiDocument/ApiDocs#.

content_type.description: The content type of the message. Defaults to 'application/json'.

is_unicode.description: Indicates whether the message should be sent with Unicode encoding. Defaults to None.

scheduletime.description: Specifies the scheduled time to send the message in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:MM'. Defaults to None.

groupid.description: Valid group ID of the current user for group messages. Defaults to None.

is_flash.description: Indicates whether the message is a flash message. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: staticmaps

path.description: Path to include on the map. Format is `{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`.

marker.description: Marker to include on the map. Format is `{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`.

documentation.name: chat_gpt_detector
documentation.description: Detects whether the given text was generated by an AI model using the provided RapidAPI key.

text.description: The text to be analyzed for AI-generated content.
text.default: Christmas is one of the most widely celebrated holidays in the world. It is a time of joy, love, and giving, and is traditionally celebrated on December 25th every year. The holiday has its roots in Christianity, where it commemorates the birth of Jesus Christ, but it is now celebrated by people of all religions and cultures.  Christmas is a time when families and friends come together to celebrate and enjoy each other's company. It is a time to share meals, exchange gifts, and participate in various traditions and activities. One of the most beloved traditions of Christmas is decorating a Christmas tree. This tradition originated in Germany and has since spread around the world. Families often decorate their trees with lights, ornaments, and tinsel.  Another beloved tradition is the exchange of gifts. Many people spend weeks or even months searching for the perfect gift for their loved ones. Giving and receiving gifts is a way to show love and appreciation for one another, and it is a way to bring joy to those around us.  Christmas is also a time for giving back to those in need. Many people donate their time, money, or resources to charities and organizations that help those who are less fortunate. This spirit of giving is one of the most important aspects of Christmas and helps to spread love and kindness to those who need it most.  In addition to these traditions, there are many other customs associated with Christmas. These include caroling, baking Christmas cookies, and watching Christmas movies. Each of these traditions brings a unique sense of joy and excitement to the holiday season.  In conclusion, Christmas is a time of joy, love, and giving. It is a time to come together with friends and family and celebrate the holiday season. While the holiday has its roots in Christianity, it is now celebrated by people of all cultures and religions around the world. Christmas traditions bring people together and create memories that will last a lifetime.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id representing the country.

asciimode.description: If set to True, display results using ASCII characters.

languagecode.description: The language code to display the results in the specified language.

documentation.name: search_video_list_by_keywords
documentation.description: Search for videos on TikTok by specified keywords and additional filtering options.

sort_type.description: Criterion for sorting results. Defaults to '0'.

publish_time.description: Time filter for when videos were posted. Defaults to '0'.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for navigating results. Defaults to '0'.

region.description: ISO region code to filter results by location. Defaults to 'US'.

count.description: Number of results to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.

documentation.name: movies
documentation.description: Fetches the basic metadata for all movies available for playback in a specific region. The results can be sorted by popularity or in alphabetical order.

limit.description: Number of records to return per request. Optional, default is 5, and the maximum is 100.

sources.description: Filter records by source. Multiple sources can be comma-separated. Optional, default is 'netflix,hulu'. Possible values include free, tv_everywhere, subscription, purchase, and specific sources such as netflix or hulu.

region.description: Filter results by region. Optional, default is 'US'. Possible values include 'US', 'FR'.

offset.description: Number of records to skip. Optional, default is 0.

sort.description: Method to sort the records. Optional, default is 'popularity'. Possible values are 'alphabetical' and 'popularity'.

documentation.name: brazil_songs
documentation.description: Fetches the Brazil Songs chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart data to retrieve.

documentation.name: get_2_stockdetails
documentation.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific stock using the StockYAPI Exchange API.

keyword.description: The stock ticker or keyword to search for. Default is 'GOOG'.

documentation.name: get_exchange_pairs
documentation.description: Retrieves the top 100 exchange pairs for a given exchange ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the exchange for which to retrieve pairs.

documentation.name: models
documentation.description: Search for car models based on various criteria such as year, make, model, make_id, and more. The results can be customized using different parameters to limit, sort, and filter the data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

make_id.description: The ID of the car make to filter the results.

year.description: The year to filter the car models.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Default is 'id'.

make.description: The car make to filter the results.

model.description: The car model to filter the results.

direction.description: The direction for sorting ('asc' or 'desc'). Default is 'asc'.

verbose.description: Whether to include detailed information like make, model, and trim. Default is 'yes'.

documentation.name: us_al
documentation.description: Fetch the current or historical gas price data for Alabama.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve historical gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current gas price data is fetched.

documentation.name: racecards
documentation.description: Fetches the list of races for a given date from the Greyhound Racing UK API.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the racecards in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Defaults to '2021-06-05' if not provided.

documentation.name: random_profiles
documentation.description: Generates a list of fake user profiles given a specified size using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

size.description: A string indicating the number of fake user profiles to generate. Defaults to '1'.

documentation.name: comments_get
documentation.description: Fetch comments for a specific song from the database.

lyric_title.description: The title of the song, track, or lyric.

sm_lid.description: The song's lyric ID. If provided, this bypasses `artist_name` and `lyric_title`. Defaults to None.

parent_id.description: When specified, the method will return any replies for the parent comment. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of comments to return. Defaults to 'all'.

page.description: The starting page of comments. Defaults to '1'.

page_size.description: The number of comments returned per page. Defaults to '25'.

page_order.description: The field to order the comments by (e.g., 'date' or 'rating'). Defaults to 'date'.

page_sort.description: The order of sorting (ascending or descending, 'asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'asc'.

documentation.name: sponge_bob
documentation.description: Generates a Sponge Bob meme with the given text using the Memeados API.

text.description: The text to be included in the Sponge Bob meme.

documentation.name: random_skin_from_class
documentation.description: Fetches information about a random Counter-Strike skin from a specified class using the CS Skin API.

class_name.description: The class of Counter-Strike skin to retrieve, e.g., "Rifle".

documentation.name: api_v1_beyblades_id
documentation.description: Fetches details of a Beyblade based on its ID using the Beyblade API v1.

is_id.description: The ID of the Beyblade to retrieve.

documentation.name: search_social_links
documentation.description: Search for social profile links based on a given query or keywords.

query.description: The search query or keywords to find social profile links.

social_networks.description: A comma-delimited list of social networks to search for.

documentation.name: search_agents
documentation.description: Search for real estate agents based on various criteria such as location, price range, language, etc.

location.description: The city or zip code to search for agents.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

price.description: The price range of properties the agent deals with, formatted as 'minPrice_maxPrice'. Defaults to None.

agentname.description: The name of the agent to search for. Defaults to None.

lang.description: The language spoken by the agent. Defaults to None.

photo.description: Whether to only show agents with a photo. 1 for yes, 0 for no. Defaults to None.

rating.description: The rating of the agent, between 1 and 5. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: view_item
documentation.description: Fetches an image and description of a catalog item based on provided credentials and identifiers.

creds_datetime.description: UTC iso8601 formatted datetime of the credentials.

creds_uuid.description: GUID representing the unique user identifier.

creds_checksum.description: Checksum of the credentials for validation.

socket_id.description: Socket in which the item is located.

catalog_item_id.description: Identifier of the catalog item to fetch details for.

format.description: Format of the request, can be either 'rest' or 'restx'.

documentation.name: get_player_details
documentation.description: Retrieves player details based on the provided username and region.

name.description: The username of the player. This is case sensitive.

region.description: The region of the player.

documentation.name: query_by_fsa_code
documentation.description: Fetches geographical boundary information for a given Canadian Forward Sortation Area (FSA) code using the VanitySoft API.

postal_fsa.description: A Canadian Forward Sortation Area (FSA) code, e.g., "T6H" or "A0A".

documentation.name: planet_vector_tiles
documentation.description: Retrieves global planet vector tiles in Protocolbuffer Binary Format (PBF) from the specified map service.

y.description: The y coordinate (tile row) of the map tile.

x.description: The x coordinate (tile column) of the map tile.

z.description: The zoom level of the map tile.

documentation.name: movie_details
documentation.description: Returns detailed information about a specific movie from the YTS API, including optional data such as cast information and images.

movie_id.description: The YTS ID of the movie. Defaults to 10.

imdb_id.description: The IMDB ID of the movie in YTS. Defaults to 10.

with_cast.description: If set to True, includes additional information about the movie's cast in the response. Defaults to None.

with_images.description: If set to True, includes URLs of related images in the response. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: extract_entities
documentation.description: Extracts named entities from the provided text using the specified model and RapidAPI key.

text.description: The text from which to extract named entities.
text.default: U.S. stocks rallied Thursday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average up 2.9% in a tempestuous first half of the year.

model.description: The model to use for named entity recognition. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: validate_card_number
documentation.description: Validate a credit card number and get the card type by using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

cardnumber.description: The credit card number to be validated.

documentation.name: tickerdata
documentation.description: Fetches historical ticker data for a given period and date range from the RapidAPI service.

period.description: The period for which to fetch the ticker data (e.g., 'daily', 'weekly').

startdate.description: The start date for the data in YYYY-MM-DD format.

tickername.description: The name of the ticker for which to fetch data.

enddate.description: The end date for the data in YYYY-MM-DD format.

documentation.name: get_token_forwarding_wallets
documentation.description: Fetches a list of token forwarding wallets from the RapidAPI Token Forwarding service.

is_id.description: Identifier for the token forwarding wallet. Defaults to 'dfe02338-43ae-453f-bd51-6f0ea98e4df9'.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return. Defaults to 100.

offset.description: Number of records to skip from the beginning. Defaults to 0.

documentation.name: get_all_coins_prices
documentation.description: Fetches the current price and rate change information for a specified cryptocurrency identifier.

is_id.description: The identifier of the cryptocurrency for which to fetch price and rate change information.

documentation.name: video_videoid
documentation.description: Fetches video information and status from the video-builder API using the provided video ID and RapidAPI key.

videoid.description: The unique identifier for the video.

documentation.name: periodic_table
documentation.description: python

all.description: If provided, specifies the type of information to retrieve about all elements in the periodic table. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: random_meme
documentation.description: Fetches a random meme from a specified genre and type using the given RapidAPI key.

genre.description: The genre of the meme. Default is 'memes'. Available genres include 'anime', 'dnd', 'history', 'historyani', 'memes', 'politics', 'science', 'lotr', and 'ww2'.

type.description: The type of the meme. Default is 'top'. Available types include 'top', 'hot', and 'new'.

documentation.name: post_details
documentation.description: Fetches the details of a Reddit post using the provided post ID and RapidAPI key.

post_id.description: The ID of the Reddit post to retrieve details for.

documentation.name: get_highlight_by_id
documentation.description: Fetches all images and videos of a specific Instagram highlight by its ID.

highlightid.description: The ID of the Instagram highlight.

documentation.name: search_single_postcode
documentation.description: Fetches the latitude and longitude coordinates for a given UK postcode using the RapidAPI service.

postcode.description: The postcode for which to fetch the latitude and longitude.

documentation.name: v1_exercises
documentation.description: Fetch up to 10 exercises from the API Ninjas Exercises API that satisfy the given search parameters.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination. Default is 0.

muscle.description: Muscle group targeted by the exercise. Possible values include: 'abdominals', 'abductors', 'adductors', 'biceps', 'calves', 'chest', 'forearms', 'glutes', 'hamstrings', 'lats', 'lower_back', 'middle_back', 'neck', 'quadriceps', 'traps', 'triceps'. Default is 'biceps'.

type.description: Exercise type. Possible values include: 'cardio', 'olympic_weightlifting', 'plyometrics', 'powerlifting', 'strength', 'stretching', 'strongman'.

difficulty.description: Difficulty level of the exercise. Possible values include: 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'expert'.

name.description: Name of the exercise. This value can be partial (e.g., 'press' will match 'Dumbbell Bench Press').

documentation.name: generar_fhir_id_qr
documentation.description: Converts a given FHIR ID into a QR code.

fhir_id.description: The FHIR ID to be converted into a QR code.

documentation.name: get_gifs_by_id
documentation.description: Fetches multiple GIF details from Giphy by their IDs.

ids.description: A comma-separated string of GIF IDs.

documentation.name: get_channel_goals
documentation.description: Fetches the goals for a specified Twitch channel using the provided RapidAPI key.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel for which to retrieve goals.

documentation.name: get_joke_of_the_day_by_category
documentation.description: Fetches the joke of the day from a specified category using the World of Jokes API.

category.description: The category of joke to be fetched.

documentation.name: getcountriesbycontinent
documentation.description: Fetch data about countries in a specified continent from the RapidAPI world population service.

continent.description: The name of the continent for which to fetch countries' data.

rank.description: Order in which to rank countries. Can take two values:

documentation.name: getdirectdebitinitiationinstruction
documentation.description: Retrieve a direct debit initiation instruction by UETR ID.

uetr.description: An RFC4122 UID used as a unique Payment Instruction Identifier.

documentation.name: temp_upload_urls
documentation.description: Generates temporary upload URLs for a given video on a specific account using the provided source name.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video.

account_id.description: The unique identifier for the account.

documentation.name: get_anime_by_id
documentation.description: Retrieves detailed information about an anime given its unique identifier using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the anime.

documentation.name: map
documentation.description: Fetches a map image in WMTS format based on the given parameters.

tilerow.description: The WMTS tile row number (latitude direction).

tilematrix.description: The tile matrix, specified in the format `[EPSG code]:[Scale value]`.

tilecol.description: The WMTS tile column number (longitude direction).

rotationangle.description: Angle to rotate the map image. Valid range is 0 to 359, default is 0.

mapstyle.description: Design of the map. Format is `[design]_[annotation size]`, default is `std_pc`.

landmarkicon.description: Display of landmark icons. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

resolution.description: Resolution of the map image. Values can be `1`, `2`, or `4`, default is `1`.

contour.description: Display of contour lines. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `on`.

bldgname.description: Display of building names. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

logo.description: Display of brand logos. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

target.description: Display contents of the map. Values can be `1` for background only, `2` for annotations only, `3` for both, default is `3`.

format.description: Output image format. Values can be `image/png` or `image/jpeg`, default is `image/png`.

documentation.name: query_for_postal_code_boundary_by_location
documentation.description: Queries the boundary of a postal code based on the given geographic coordinates.

longitude.description: The longitudinal coordinate of the location.

latitude.description: The latitudinal coordinate of the location.

documentation.name: played
documentation.description: Fetches the most recently played CS:GO matches from the RapidAPI service.

content_type.description: The content type for the request. Default is 'application/json'.

limit.description: The number of matches to retrieve. Default is 10.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Default is 1.

documentation.name: random_skin_from_weapon
documentation.description: Retrieves information for a random Counter-Strike skin from a specified weapon.

weapon_name.description: The name of the weapon for which to retrieve a random skin.

documentation.name: verify_the_existence_of_email
documentation.description: Verifies the existence of an email address using the Email Existence Validator API.

email.description: The email address to verify.

documentation.name: email_validate_regex
documentation.description: Validates an email address using the Email Validator API.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

documentation.name: shows_id_episodes
documentation.description: Retrieve a list of episodes for a specific show from the given platform.

platform.description: The platform from which to retrieve the episodes (e.g., 'ios', 'android', 'androidtv', 'web').

is_id.description: The ID of the show.

offset.description: The number of records to skip in the results. Default is 0.

region.description: The region to filter the episodes by (e.g., 'US', 'FR'). Default is 'US'.

limit.description: The number of records to return per request, with a maximum of 100. Default is 25.

sort.description: The order to sort the records by. Use 'regular' for default order or 'reverse' for most recent episodes first. Default is 'regular'.

season.description: The specific season for which to retrieve episodes. If not specified, episodes from all seasons will be retrieved. Default is 1.

documentation.name: search_author
documentation.description: Search for an author using the Open Library API.

author.description: The name of the author to search for.

documentation.name: ip
documentation.description: Fetches data for the provided IP address using the IP Geo Location and IP Reputation API.

ip.description: The IP address for which data is to be fetched. Defaults to '8.8.8.8'.

documentation.name: timezone_by_id
documentation.description: Fetches information for a given time zone using the RapidAPI service.

timezone.description: The time zone to look up.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Defaults to 'offset,daylights_offset,daylights,daylights_code,timezone'.

lang.description: The language code for the response, following ISO 639-1 standard. Defaults to 'de'.

documentation.name: type_sustainability_get_product_involvement
documentation.description: Fetches product involvement information from the Sustainability tab for a given ETF or fund.

type.description: One of the following values: 'etf' or 'fund'. Specifies the type of the financial product.

securityid.description: The value of the securityId field returned in the API endpoint ../market/v2/get-returns.

documentation.name: sar
documentation.description: Fetches the Parabolic SAR (SAR) data for a specified financial instrument using the Twelve Data API.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values: `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

maximum.description: Maximum number of data points to retrieve.

outputsize.description: The size of the data to be returned, with a default of 30.

format.description: The format of the returned data. Options are `csv` or `json`. Default is `json`.

acceleration.description: The acceleration factor used in the SAR calculation.

documentation.name: macd_crossover_down
documentation.description: Fetches a list of stocks having a MACD crossover down signal from the provided API.

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. Default is 1.

documentation.name: get_models_by_make_id
documentation.description: Fetches a list of all car models for a given car make ID using the RapidAPI Car Specs API.

makeid.description: The ID of the car make for which to retrieve the models.

documentation.name: get_individual_bitcoin_news_sources
documentation.description: Fetches information for a specific Bitcoin news resource from RapidAPI.

newspaperid.description: The unique identifier for the news resource.

documentation.name: matchmanagers
documentation.description: Retrieve the managers for a specific Ice Hockey match using the match ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the match for which to retrieve managers.

documentation.name: fedora_image_fedora_get
documentation.description: Fetches data from the Fedora image API using the given URL and RapidAPI key.

url.description: The URL of the image to be fetched.

documentation.name: retrieve_collections
documentation.description: Retrieve collections from the Blur API based on given criteria.

pagesize.description: Number of records per page. If not specified, the default is None.

is_from.description: Starting point of the records. If not specified, the default is None.

slug.description: Slug identifier for the collection. If not specified, the default is None.

contractaddress.description: Contract address of the collection. If not specified, the default is None.

orderby.description: Order in which results are returned. Either 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

sortby.description: Field by which to sort results. Options include 'floorPrice', 'floorPriceOneDay', 'floorPriceOneWeek', 'volumeFifteenMinutes', 'volumeOneDay', 'volumeOneWeek', 'bestCollectionBid', 'totalCollectionBidValue', 'totalSupply', 'numberOwners'. Default is 'volumeOneDay'.

documentation.name: get_sign_hexagram
documentation.description: Fetches detailed information for a specified sign hexagram category using the Sign Hexagram API.

category.description: The ID of the category for which to retrieve the hexagram information.

documentation.name: user_post_videos

count.description: The number of videos to fetch, with a maximum limit of 35. Default is '10'.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier of the TikTok user. Default is '@tiktok'.

cursor.description: The cursor position for pagination. Default is '0'.

user_id.description: The user ID of the TikTok user. Default is '107955'.

documentation.name: searchzodiacbysign
documentation.description: Fetches information about a zodiac sign from the Zodiac API.

sign.description: The zodiac sign to search for. Ensure the first letter is capitalized.

documentation.name: top_posts_by_username
documentation.description: Fetches the top posts by a specific Reddit username within a specified time frame.

username.description: The Reddit username to fetch top posts for.

time.description: The time period to consider for top posts. Allowed values are 'hour', 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year', 'all'.

cursor.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of results.

documentation.name: userinfo
documentation.description: Fetch user information from Instagram using the RapidAPI service.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch information.

documentation.name: get_calculate_investment
documentation.description: Calculates various investment returns based on given parameters using an external API.

rate.description: The annual interest rate of the investment in percentage.

principal.description: The initial amount of money invested.

time.description: The duration of the investment in months.

compounding.description: The frequency of compounding interest. Valid options are 'yearly', 'semi-annually', 'quarterly', and 'monthly'. Default is 'yearly'.

in_currency.description: The currency of the investment. Default is 'USD'.

format.description: Whether to format the result. Valid options are 'yes' and 'no'. Default is 'yes'.

to_currency.description: The currency to convert the result into. Default is 'USD'.

documentation.name: viewoverallscreeningresult
documentation.description: Fetches the overall screening result for a given customer and screening ID from the ClearDIL API.

authorization.description: Authorization token required for the API request.

content_type.description: The content type for the API request, typically 'application/json'.

customer_a_id.description: The customer ID for whom the screening result is being fetched.

screening_a_id.description: The screening ID whose result is being requested.

documentation.name: get_5_latest_endpoint
documentation.description: Fetch the latest exchange rates for the specified currencies.

base.description: The base currency code against which exchange rates are calculated.

documentation.name: tokens_all_market_cap

sorttype.description: The type of sorting to apply (e.g., 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending).

searchterms.description: Specific search terms to filter tokens.

take.description: The number of records to take for pagination.

chains.description: Comma-separated list of specific blockchains to filter the tokens by.

documentation.name: real_time_information

cmd.description: Command parameter for the API request. Examples can be found at http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/examples.aspx.

orig.description: Specifies the station by its abbreviation. A list of station abbreviations can be found at http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/abbrev.aspx. Use 'ALL' to get all current ETDs.

documentation.name: v1_randomword
documentation.description: Fetches a random word from the API Ninjas Random Word API.

type.description: The type of word to return. Possible values are 'noun', 'verb', 'adjective', 'adverb'. Defaults to 'verb'.

documentation.name: rulesets
documentation.description: Fetches the list of available rule sets for the specified language from the API.

documentation.name: profile_image

documentation.name: stock_v2_get_short_interest
documentation.description: Fetches the short interest data for a given stock identified by its performance ID from the Morning Star API.

documentation.name: symbols_suggested

documentation.name: full_grid_search
documentation.description: Performs a full grid search and retrieves the ranking of a specific business at each coordinate point within the grid. The grid cells in the results are ordered from left to right and then top to bottom.

place_id.description: The Google Place ID of the business to rank.

query.description: The search query or keyword.

lng.description: The longitude value for the grid center coordinate point.

x_user_agent.description: The device type for the search. Default is `desktop`.

zoom.description: The Google Maps zoom level for the search at each grid point. Default is '13'.

radius_units.description: The units for the `radius` parameter (e.g., 'km' for kilometers, 'mi' for miles). Default is `km`.

documentation.description: Fetches food information based on a given UPC (barcode) using the Dietagram API.

documentation.name: locations_auto_complete_deprecated

longitude.description: The longitude of the end user's location, used for sorting purposes. Defaults to None.

from_tzname.description: The source time zone name. Defaults to 'UTC'.

documentation.name: recent_trades_list
documentation.description: Fetches the recent trades for a given cryptocurrency symbol from the RapidAPI crypto markets service.

symbol.description: The cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., 'BTC' for Bitcoin) for which recent trades are to be fetched.

documentation.name: risk_free_rate
documentation.description: Fetches the risk-free rate for a specific date, duration, and geography using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

duration.description: Duration for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched. Supported values are '3m' (default), '5y', and '10y'.

geography.description: Geography for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched. Currently, only 'US' is supported. Default is 'US'.

date.description: Specific date for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Default is '2023-05-10'.

documentation.name: companies_balance_sheet_statements
documentation.description: Fetches the balance sheet statements of a company using the given symbol.

symbol.description: The symbol name of the company for which the balance sheet statements are to be fetched.

apikey.description: The API key required for accessing the Financial Modeling Prep service.

documentation.name: au_car_averages
documentation.description: Fetches average car price information for a given car model, year, and make using the ToolBench RapidAPI service.

year.description: The production year of the car to query.

documentation.name: top_paid_ipad_apps
documentation.description: Gets a list of the top paid iPad apps from the specified category and country.

category.description: The App Store category for which to fetch the top paid iPad apps. Defaults to '6016'.

country.description: The country code for which to fetch the top paid iPad apps. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en'.

num.description: The number of results to return. Defaults to 100.

documentation.name: rsi_oversold
documentation.description: Fetches a list of stocks that have an RSI oversold signal from the specified API endpoint.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

documentation.name: get_currency_by_name
documentation.description: Fetches various states of a specific currency's prices from a given API.

coinid.description: The identifier of the currency to fetch prices for.

documentation.name: get_coin_issuance_blockchains
documentation.description: Fetches the issuance blockchains for a given coin using the CoinRanking API.

uuid.description: UUID of the coin for which the blockchains are being requested.

offset.description: Pagination offset. Default is 0.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 50, with a valid range of 0-100.

documentation.name: get_the_timezones
documentation.description: Fetches the list of timezones from the specified RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name.description: The name filter to apply to the timezones. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: random_crypto_by_id
documentation.description: Retrieve a fake cryptocurrency asset by its unique identifier.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the cryptocurrency asset to be retrieved.

documentation.name: crypto_symbols
documentation.description: Returns a list of all available cryptocurrencies from the RapidAPI service.

includenames.description: If True, include cryptocurrency names in the response. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: match_details_by_id
documentation.description: Retrieves match details for a given Match ID using the RapidAPI endpoint. Match IDs can be obtained through the Matches List endpoint, including live matches and those played since 1990.

match_id.description: The unique identifier for a specific match.

documentation.name: form
documentation.description: Retrieve the pregame team form data for a given event using the SofaSport API.

event_id.description: The ID of the event for which to retrieve the team form.

documentation.name: peer_ratio_averages
documentation.description: Fetches and returns an average of company peer ratios for trailing twelve months (TTM) data for a given company symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company for which to fetch peer ratio averages.

documentation.name: sports_api
documentation.description: Fetches a listing of all upcoming sports events for football, cricket, and golf in JSON format using the weatherapi-com RapidAPI service.

q.description: The location query to search for sports events.

documentation.name: astronomy_api
documentation.description: Fetches astronomical data including sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phase, and illumination in JSON format based on the provided query parameters.

q.description: The query parameter for retrieving data. It supports various formats such as:

dt.description: The date for which to retrieve the astronomical data. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: convert_rgb
documentation.description: Converts an RGB color code to other color codes such as Hex, HSL, and CMYK using the RapidAPI service.

r.description: The red component of the RGB color.

g.description: The green component of the RGB color.

b.description: The blue component of the RGB color.

documentation.name: get_1_shoot_thumbnail
documentation.description: Generates a thumbnail image from a given URL using the Pagepeeker API. Optionally, the thumbnail can be refreshed.

size.description: The desired size of the thumbnail. Options are:

url.description: The URL from which to generate the thumbnail.

refresh.description: Set to '1' to force a refresh of the thumbnail. Defaults to '1'.

documentation.name: feeds_list_similarities
documentation.description: Fetches a list of similar recipes based on the given parameters.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the recipe, typically obtained from feeds/list or feeds/search API responses.

limit.description: The number of items to return per response.

start.description: The offset for items to be ignored in the response, useful for paging.

apifeedtype.description: The type of feed to query, generally returned in feeds/list or feeds/search API responses. Default is 'moreFrom'.

authorid.description: The author ID, typically returned in feeds/list or feeds/search API responses. Default is 'Yummly'.

documentation.name: evaluate_expression
documentation.description: Evaluates a mathematical expression using an external API and returns the result.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to be evaluated.

documentation.name: get_continent_by_id
documentation.description: Fetches and returns continent information based on a given ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the continent to fetch information for.

documentation.name: single_country
documentation.description: Fetch all details of a country by its ID from the PageantDB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the country to retrieve details for.

documentation.name: star
documentation.description: Fetches full information about a star given its ID from the Stars API using RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The ID of the star to fetch information about.

documentation.name: translate_to_old_english
documentation.description: Translates the given text to Old English using the FunTranslations API.

x_funtranslations_api_secret.description: API Key for accessing the FunTranslations Old English Translator.

text.description: The text to be translated into Old English.
text.default: A hearty meal, a happy laughter is all we need.

documentation.name: driving_directions
documentation.description: Fetches driving directions and routes between specified source and destination coordinates using the Waze/Google API.

source_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the starting point.

destination_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the destination.

return_route_coordinates.description: Whether to return the route coordinate pairs. Defaults to None.

arrival_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the desired arrival time. Defaults to None, which returns directions for the current time.

documentation.name: v1_airports
documentation.description: Fetches information from the API Ninjas Airports API endpoint based on specified search criteria. At least one of the optional parameters must be provided.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

region.description: Administrative region such as state or province within a country (e.g., California).

city.description: Airport city (e.g., London).

country.description: Minimum airport elevation in feet.

timezone.description: Airport timezone (e.g., Europe/London).

name.description: Airport name. This parameter supports partial matching (e.g., Heathrow will match London Heathrow Airport). Defaults to 'London Heathrow'.

icao.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 4-character airport code.

iata.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 3-character airport code.

documentation.name: get_country_details
documentation.description: Fetch details for a country based on the given ISO-3166 country code.

code.description: The ISO-3166 country code to fetch details for.

documentation.name: ideas_detail
documentation.description: Fetches detailed information about an ideal post based on the given UUID.

uuid.description: The UUID of the specific post. This value is obtained from the `image_url` field returned in the `/ideas/list` endpoint.

lang.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en'.

documentation.name: stock_get_daily_dividend_data
documentation.description: Fetch and return the daily dividend data for a given stock symbol within a specified date range.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple Inc.).

end_date.description: The end date for the data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format, representing the last day data will be pulled.

start_date.description: The start date for the data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format, representing the first day data will be pulled.

region.description: The market region (e.g., 'US', 'BR', 'AU'). Default is 'US'.

documentation.name: get_city_detail
documentation.description: Fetch detailed information about a city using its name via the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the city for which details are to be fetched.

documentation.name: get_matches_on_a_specific_date
documentation.description: Fetches the matches scheduled on a specific date, considering the provided UTC offset.

date.description: The date for which to query the matches, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

utc_offset.description: The UTC offset to cater to the required timezone. Default is 8. Must be between -12 to 14.

documentation.name: community_post_comments
documentation.description: Retrieves comments for a YouTube community post using the specified cursor token.

cursor.description: A token used for pagination to fetch the next set of comments from the Community Post Details endpoint.

documentation.name: verse_verse
documentation.description: Fetches a biblical verse from the Uncovered Treasure API.

verse.description: A commonly used English name with chapter number and optionally verse number (e.g., "1 Corinthians 1", "1 Corinthians 1:5", "James 3"). Ranged searches are not supported.

callback.description: An optional JSONP callback function name for the API response. Default is None.

documentation.name: getproducts
documentation.description: Search for products by name and retrieves newly added items from various sources.

query.description: The search query for the products.

page.description: The page number to retrieve.

country.description: The country code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'countryUS'.

location.description: The location to filter the search results. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

period.description: The period in days to filter newly added items. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: name_to_uuid
documentation.description: Convert a Minecraft username to a UUID using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

name.description: The Minecraft username to be converted to a UUID.

documentation.name: alldetails_185_225_233_110_30015
documentation.description: Retrieves all details from a server given its IP address and port using the VRising Server Query API.

ip.description: The IP address of the server.

port.description: The port number of the server.

documentation.name: financial_income_statement
documentation.description: Fetches the financial income statement for a given company ticker symbol, formatted by the specified style and frequency.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the company to retrieve financial information for.

formstyle.description: The format style of the returned data. Defaults to 'dataframe'.

freq.description: The frequency of the financial data, either 'A' for annual or 'Q' for quarterly. Defaults to 'Q'.

documentation.name: by_location
documentation.description: Searches for homeless shelters based on provided geographical coordinates and radius.

lat.description: The latitude of the location to search nearby shelters.

radius.description: The search radius in miles (maximum 10 miles).

lng.description: The longitude of the location to search nearby shelters.

documentation.name: get_car_specs
documentation.description: Fetches detailed specifications for a car based on the given trim ID.

trimid.description: The trim ID of the car for which to retrieve specifications.

documentation.name: genderize
documentation.description: Predict the gender of a person based on their name using the Genderize API.

name.description: The name of the person whose gender is to be predicted.

documentation.name: carbonfootprintfrompublictransit
documentation.description: Calculates the CO2 emissions in kilograms from the use of public transportation based on the distance traveled and type of transit.

type.description: The type of transportation, one of: 'Taxi', 'ClassicBus', 'EcoBus', 'Coach', 'NationalTrain', 'LightRail', 'Subway', 'FerryOnFoot', 'FerryInCar'.

documentation.name: card
documentation.description: Draw a card from a regular 52-card playing deck using the RapidAPI card draw simulator.

suit.description: The suit of the card to draw (e.g., 'hearts', 'diamonds', 'clubs', 'spades'). Default is 'all' to allow any suit.

value.description: The value of the card to draw (e.g., 'A', '2', 'K'). Default is 'A'.

documentation.name: specific_giveaway_details
documentation.description: Fetch details from a specific giveaway using the giveaway ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the giveaway to fetch details for.

documentation.name: hex_to_rgb
documentation.description: Converts a hex color code to an RGB color code using the Convexity API.

hex.description: The hex color code to be converted.

documentation.name: ideal_weight
documentation.description: Calculate the ideal weight based on gender and height using four different well-known equations (Hamwi, Devine, Miller, Robinson).

gender.description: The gender of the individual ('male' or 'female').

height.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

documentation.name: teams_list
documentation.description: Fetches a list of cricket teams based on the specified type from the Cricbuzz API.

type.description: The type of teams to list. Valid options are `international`, `league`, `domestic`, or `women`.

documentation.name: get_expressions
documentation.description: Fetch expressions that include a specified word from the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which to retrieve expressions.

limite.description: The maximum number of expressions to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.

documentation.name: user_profile
documentation.description: Fetches and returns the user profile data from the Spotify API.

is_id.description: The user's unique Spotify ID.

playlistlimit.description: The maximum number of playlists to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

artistlimit.description: The maximum number of artists to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

documentation.name: major_league_soccer_standings
documentation.description: Fetches the Major League Soccer standings for a given season using the RapidAPI service.

season.description: The season year for which to retrieve standings. Defaults to None, in which case the latest season's standings are fetched.

documentation.name: ufc_fight_night_holloway_vs_allen_april_15_2023
documentation.description: Fetch details about UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen held on April 15, 2023.

limit.description: The number of records to return. Default is None.

offset.description: The number of records to skip before starting to return results. Default is None.

documentation.name: last_year_summary
documentation.description: Retrieve the last year's performance summary for a given player using the RapidAPI service.

player_id.description: The ID of the player whose summary is to be retrieved.

documentation.name: gettalks
documentation.description: Retrieve information about specific TED talks based on the provided parameters.

is_id.description: ID of a desired specific talk.

audio_lang.description: Return talks which their audio language is the provided language. The provided value should be the language slug according to the /audio_languages endpoint.

speaker.description: Return talks which at least one of their speakers is the provided speaker. The provided value should be the speaker slug according to the /speakers endpoint.

publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only on the exact provided date.

topic.description: Return talks which at least one of their topics is the provided topic. The provided value should be the topic slug according to the /topics endpoint.

subtitle_lang.description: Return talks which have subtitles in the provided language. The provided value should be the language slug according to the /subtitle_languages endpoint.

max_duration.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at most the provided value.

to_publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only before the provided date.

from_publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only after the provided date.

min_duration.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at least the provided value.

record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only on the exact provided date.

to_record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only before the provided date.

from_record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only after the provided date.

documentation.name: count
documentation.description: Fetches the total number of expired followers from an OnlyFans API endpoint.

signstart.description: The start of the signature used for authorization.

signend.description: The end of the signature used for authorization.

timezone.description: The timezone setting.

documentation.name: minmax
documentation.description: Retrieve the lowest and highest values over a specified period (MINMAX) for a given financial instrument.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supports: '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', '1month'.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

series_type.description: Type of series data. Supports: 'open', 'high', 'low', 'close'. Default is 'close'.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Default is 30.

format.description: Desired format of the output. Can be 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'json'.

time_period.description: Time period over which the minmax values are calculated. Default is 9.

documentation.name: latest_information_for_symbol
documentation.description: Fetch the latest ticker information for a given symbol from the Bybit API.

symbol.description: The market symbol to retrieve information for.

documentation.name: live_room_bio

name.description: The name of the live room for which to fetch the biography.

documentation.name: competitions_get_short_info
documentation.description: Fetches short information about one or more competitions based on the provided IDs and domain from the TransferMarket API.

ids.description: The IDs of the competitions to fetch information for. Multiple IDs should be separated by commas (e.g., 'L1,L2,L3,GB1,ES1,IT1').

domain.description: The domain for the request, which can be one of 'com', 'de', 'be', 'es', 'it', 'nl', 'pl', 'pt', 'com.tr', or 'world'. Defaults to 'de'.

documentation.name: get_airplane_details
documentation.description: Fetches details of an airplane using the provided code.

code.description: The unique identifier of the airplane to fetch details for.

documentation.name: collection
documentation.description: Fetches TLE (Two-Line Element) data from the TLE API based on the specified search query.

search.description: The search term to query the API. Defaults to 'ISS'.

documentation.name: search_for_a_word_in_quran
documentation.description: Search for a given keyword in the English translation of the Quran and return the verses containing the keyword and total matches in JSON format.

searchterm.description: The keyword or phrase to search for in the Quran.

documentation.name: treeequivalent
documentation.description: Calculate the number of trees required to create a given weight of paper.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight (e.g., 'kg' or 'lb').

documentation.name: get_3_fluctuation_endpoint
documentation.description: Fetches the percentage change in exchange rates for specified currencies over a given time period.

end_date.description: The end date for the time period of the fluctuation data.

base.description: The base currency for which the fluctuation data is to be retrieved.

start_date.description: The start date for the time period of the fluctuation data.

symbols.description: Specific currencies for which the fluctuation data is to be retrieved. Defaults to 'usd'.

documentation.name: license_plate_lookup

documentation.name: get_role_ids
documentation.description: Retrieves details for a specific document from the signNow API.

document_id.description: The unique identifier for the document.

documentation.name: get_company_jobs_count
documentation.description: Retrieves the number of job openings a specified company has posted on LinkedIn.

company_id.description: The unique identifier of the company whose job openings count is to be retrieved.

documentation.name: email_endpoint
documentation.description: Queries an email bounce detection API to check the deliverability status of an email address.

email_string.description: The email address to be checked.

documentation.name: disposable_domain_and_suggest_domain
documentation.description: Checks if the given domain is disposable and provides a suggested alternative domain.

domain.description: The domain to be checked.

documentation.name: pair_id
documentation.description: Fetches information of a pair using the given pair address from the Uniswap V2 API.
