documentation.name: aliexpress_store_info
documentation.description: Fetches detailed store information from AliExpress using the given seller ID and optional locale, region, and currency parameters.

sellerid.description: The ID of the AliExpress seller whose store information is requested.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and other content in the selected language.

region.description: The region to accurately get the shipping costs and other promo/deals for a specific geo-location.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price in the selected currency.

documentation.name: uuidv3_generator
documentation.description: Generates a UUIDv3 based on the provided namespace and name using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

namespace.description: The namespace to use for generating the UUIDv3. Allowed values are 'dns', 'url', 'oid', 'x500', and 'nil'.

name.description: The name to use for generating the UUIDv3.

documentation.name: verify_the_captcha
documentation.description: Verifies the given CAPTCHA using the provided uuid and Toolbench RapidAPI key.

captcha.description: The value of the CAPTCHA to be verified.

uuid.description: The unique identifier for the CAPTCHA session.

documentation.name: check_if_text_contains_profanity
documentation.description: Check if a given text contains profanity using the Purgomalum API.

text.description: The text to be checked for profanity.

documentation.name: investor_grades
documentation.description: Fetches investor grades for specified cryptocurrency tokens within a date range.

startdate.description: The start date for the data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

enddate.description: The end date for the data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

tokens.description: A comma-separated list of cryptocurrency tokens for which to fetch investor grades.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is '1000'.

documentation.name: calendar_events
documentation.description: Fetches the calendar events for a particular stock symbol using the Yahoo Finance API via RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch calendar events for.

documentation.name: symbols_get_peers
documentation.description: Fetches the peer symbols of a given stock symbol using the Seeking Alpha API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to query for peers. Multiple symbols can be queried by separating them with a comma (e.g. 'aapl,tsla').

documentation.name: product_data
documentation.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific product from the Ecommerce Product API.

product.description: The name of the product to retrieve information for.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.

documentation.name: us_ga
documentation.description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Georgia.

date.description: The date for which to fetch historical data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned.

documentation.name: get_status
documentation.description: Retrieve the delivery status report for a given message ID using the provided API key.

msg_id.description: The unique identifier of the SMS message. This can be obtained by setting the parameter `JSON`, `return_msg_id` or `details` to `1` when sending the SMS via the API. It can also be retrieved from the message journal in the user area.

documentation.name: validatetest
documentation.description: Validate any phone number from any country using the given RapidAPI key.

number.description: Phone number to be validated. This can be provided in two formats:

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country in capital letters. This is optional if the number parameter starts with the + symbol. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: settag
documentation.description: Sets a new tag for the SMS receive service using the provided RapidAPI key.

tag.description: The value of the new tag, with a maximum length of 16 characters.

documentation.name: address
documentation.description: Sends a request to an address correction and geocoding API using the provided address lines and API key.

addressline1.description: The first line of the address.

addressline2.description: The second line of the address, typically including city, state, and zip code.

documentation.name: getevents
documentation.description: Fetches data about events from the Kalshi trading API.

series_ticker.description: Series ticker to retrieve contracts for.

status.description: Restricts the events to those with certain statuses. Accepted values are: 'open', 'closed', 'settled'.

cursor.description: Pointer to the next page of records in the pagination. If provided, it should be the cursor string from a previous request.

limit.description: Number of results per page. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

documentation.name: placessearchinradius
documentation.description: Get places within a specified radius from a given center point in GeoJSON format.

latitude.description: Latitude of the center of the search radius.

longitude.description: Longitude of the center of the search radius.

radius.description: Radius of the search area in miles (min value is 1, max value is 50).

documentation.name: laliga_standings
documentation.description: Fetches the standings for LaLiga for a given season.

season.description: The season to retrieve the standings for, e.g., '2022'. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: find_zip_codes_by_city
documentation.description: This function returns all zip codes associated with a given city. If multiple cities share the same name, zip codes for all those cities will be returned.

city.description: The name of the city for which to find zip codes.

x_traceid.description: A trace ID that is copied to the API response header. Default is 'optional_abc123'.

documentation.name: search_sex_offenders
documentation.description: Search for sex offenders using either GIS parameters or attribute parameters.

lastname.description: The last name of the sex offender to search for.

state.description: The state to search within. Default is 'California'.

city.description: The city to search within.

firstname.description: The first name of the sex offender to search for. Default is 'David'.

lat.description: The latitude for GIS search. Default is 37.

radius.description: The search radius in miles for GIS search. Default is 1 mile.

lng.description: The longitude for GIS search. Default is -122.

documentation.name: airport_arrivals
documentation.description: Fetch the flight arrivals for a specified airport on a given date, optionally filtered by carrier.

carriercode.description: The IATA code of the airline carrier. Defaults to None.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the arrivals, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: v1_textlanguage
documentation.description: Determines the language of a given text using the API Ninjas Text Language API.

text.description: The text for which the language needs to be identified.

documentation.name: word
documentation.description: Generates lorem ipsum text by requesting a specified number of words from the RapidAPI lorem ipsum service.

amount.description: The number of lorem ipsum words to generate.

documentation.name: daily_sentiment
documentation.description: Gets the daily sentiment score for a given asset symbol and date using the SentiTrade API.

symbol.description: The asset ticker symbol to query.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the sentiment score in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

documentation.name: convert_a_unit
documentation.description: Converts a unit from one measurement to another using the Unit Measurement Conversion API.

tounit.description: The unit to which the value should be converted.

fromunit.description: The original unit of the value.

type.description: The type/category of the units (e.g., length, mass).

documentation.name: captcha_generator
documentation.description: Generates a CAPTCHA image with optional customizations and returns the resulting data.

fontname.description: The font to be used for the CAPTCHA text. Supported font names are 'sora', 'noto-sans', and 'ubuntu'. Default is 'sora'.

noise_number.description: The amount of noise to include in the CAPTCHA image. Default is 10.

text.description: Custom text to be used as the CAPTCHA solution. If not provided, a random text solution will be generated.

documentation.name: query_for_ldu_boundary_by_h3index
documentation.description: Queries for a Local Delivery Unit (LDU) boundary by its H3 index.

h3ndex.description: The H3 index used to query the LDU boundary.

documentation.name: rocr
documentation.description: Calculates the Rate of Change Ratio (ROCR) for a given financial instrument over a specified time period.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values include: `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

format.description: The format of the output, which can either be `csv` or `json`. Default is `json`.

time_period.description: Number of periods to go back for calculating the ROCR. Default is 9.

documentation.name: remove_profanity
documentation.description: Removes profanity from the provided text using the PurgoMalum web service. Optionally, custom words can be added to the profanity list, and specific fill text or characters can be used to replace profanity.

text.description: Input text to be processed for profanity.

add.description: A comma-separated list of words to add to the profanity list. Accepts letters, numbers, underscores (_), and commas (,). Maximum 10 words or 200 characters. Defaults to None.

fill_text.description: Text used to replace any words matching the profanity list. Accepts letters, numbers, underscores (_), tildes (~), exclamation points (!), dashes/hyphens (-), equal signs (=), pipes (|), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), asterisks (*), curly brackets ({ }), square brackets ([ ]), and parentheses (). Maximum length of 20 characters. Defaults to None.

fill_char.description: Single character used to replace any words matching the profanity list, filling to the length of the word replaced. Accepts underscore (_), tilde (~), dash/hyphen (-), equal sign (=), pipe (|), and asterisk (*). Defaults to None.

employment_types.description: Specifies employment types as a comma-separated list (e.g., 'FULLTIME', 'PARTTIME').

documentation.name: autocomplete_places
documentation.description: Returns a list of places that match a given prefix and specified filter properties, useful for creating "search as you type" inputs.

limit.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used with `skip` to paginate results. Defaults to 10, maximum is 100.

skip.description: Number of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used with `limit` to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

language.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) for the localized name of the place. If unavailable, `localizedName` property will be null.

country.description: Filters places by their country ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US,CA,MX'). Defaults to 'US,CA'.

admindivision1.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US.CA,US.DE').

accuracyradiuskm.description: Maximum radius in kilometers from the specified coordinates (`latitude` and `longitude`) to filter places. Defaults to 100km.

latitude.description: Latitude to filter places by their location. Ignored if `longitude` is not specified.

admindivision2.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas.

q.description: Query string to find places whose names start with this prefix. Defaults to 'Sea'.

longitude.description: Longitude to filter places by their location. Ignored if `latitude` is not specified.

type.description: Filters places by their type. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas. Valid types are 'CITY', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_1', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_2', and 'COUNTRY'. Defaults to 'CITY'.

documentation.name: charts_track

pagesize.description: The number of items to fetch per response, with a maximum of 20. Defaults to `20`.

startfrom.description: The starting index for paging through the results. Defaults to `0`.

locale.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to `'en-US'`.

rating.description: Only return reviews with a certain star rating. Allowed values are `ANY`, `ONE_STAR`, `TWO_STARS`, `THREE_STARS`, `FOUR_STARS`, `FIVE_STARS`. Default is `ANY`.

limit.description: Maximum number of reviews in the results. Default is 10.

language.description: The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code (ISO 639-1 alpha-2). Default is `en`.

Initially, a snapshot call should be issued followed by delta calls to capture changes since the given `since` value. This function utilizes an API to return market data based on the various filters specified in the parameters.

sport_id.description: The ID of the sport for which markets data is requested.

country.description: Filters places by their country `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US,CA'). Default is 'US,CA'.

limit.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used with `skip` to paginate results. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

admindivision2.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas.

accuracyradiuskm.description: Maximum radius (in kilometers) from the point specified by `latitude` and `longitude` to filter places located within the area. Default is 100 km.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `longitude` is not specified.

q.description: Query string to find places with a similar name. Default is 'New York'.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `latitude` is not specified.

terms.description: Narrows down the results to articles that contain all the provided keywords. The terms should consist of one to three words separated by a dash. Example value: `election-campaign`.

to.description: Narrows down the results to articles published before the provided date-time in UTC. The format should be `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm`. Example value: `2022-09-18T15:30`. Date-times of the future do not affect the result.

name.description: Search all platform names. Wildcard searches can be performed using the * character (e.g., name=*platform). Multiple items can be searched at once by sending a comma-separated list (e.g., name=ethereum,*token). Default is 'ethereum'.

page.description: The page number to start from. Default is 10.

slug.description: Search all platform slugs. Wildcard searches can be performed using the * character (e.g., slug=*token). Multiple items can be searched at once by sending a comma-separated list (e.g., slug=ethereum,*token). Default is 'ethereum'.

documentation.name: get_airports

lid.description: U.S. FAA Location Identifier (12,566 entries), or an empty string.

name.description: Filter results by name. The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Zabrat Airport', send 'Zabrat,Airport'. Default is 'Ishigaki,Airport'.

limit.description: Limit to n results. Default is 50.

elevationover.description: Filter airports with an MSL elevation, or highest point of the landing area in feet, over this value. Default is 50.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (plus XK for Kosovo). Default is 'JP'.

city.description: Filter results by city. The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Zakynthos Island', send 'Zakynthos,Island'. Default is 'Ishigaki'.

skip.description: Skip first n results. Default is 0.

sortbyorder.description: Specify the sorting order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

elevationunder.description: Filter airports with an MSL elevation, or highest point of the landing area in feet, under this value. Default is 2000.

tz.description: Timezone expressed as a tz database name (IANA-compliant) or an empty string for Antarctica. Default is 'Asia/Tokyo'.

icao.description: Filter results by ICAO code. Default is 'ROIG'.

subd.description: Filter results by subdivision (e.g., state, province, region, etc.). The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Newfoundland and Labrador', send 'Newfoundland,and,Labrador'. Default is 'Okinawa'.

iata.description: Filter results by IATA code. Default is 'ISG'.

sort.description: The sorting order of the items. Default is None.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Default is None.

pagesize.description: The number of items to display per page. Default is None.

region.description: The region to accurately get shipping costs and other deals. Default is None.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and content in the selected language. Default is None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price in. Default is None.

documentation.name: get_offers_by_watch_id
documentation.description: Retrieves offers for a specific watch identified by `watch_id` from the Watch Signals API.

watch_id.description: The ID of the watch for which to retrieve offers.

documentation.name: username_to_uuid
documentation.description: Converts a Minecraft username to a UUID by making an API request.

username.description: The Minecraft username to convert to a UUID.

documentation.name: get_from_eztv
documentation.description: Fetches torrent search results from EZTV using the provided search topic.

searchtopic.description: The topic to search for on EZTV.

documentation.name: query_for_ldu_boundary

resolution.description: The resolution of the boundary data. Defaults to 10.

documentation.name: get_all_app_keys
documentation.description: Fetch all keys for a specified application using the RapidAPI service.

appid.description: The unique identifier for the specific application. Obtainable through the "Get All Apps" endpoint.

documentation.name: get_6_month_historical_daily_prices
documentation.description: Retrieves 6 months of historical daily stock prices for the given ticker, including adjusted Open, High, Low, and Close prices, as well as Daily Volume, Dividend, and Split information.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve the historical prices.

documentation.name: staffs_list_by_competition
documentation.description: Retrieves a list of staff members associated with a specific competition or league.

is_id.description: The ID value of the competition or league to retrieve staff members for.

domain.description: The domain for the region, one of the following: com, de, be, es, it, nl, pl, pt, com.tr, or world. Defaults to 'de'.

documentation.name: lunch_ingredient
documentation.description: Retrieve a random lunch recipe that contains a specific ingredient using the Recipe Finder API.

ingredient.description: The name of the ingredient to include in the lunch recipe.

documentation.name: get_a_random_quote_from_a_specific_book
documentation.description: Fetches a random quote from a specific self-help book using its book ID.

book_id.description: The identifier for the specific book from which to fetch a random quote.

documentation.name: youtube_video_details
documentation.description: Fetches detailed information about a YouTube video using the provided video ID or URL.

is_id.description: The video ID or video URL for a YouTube video. Examples include:

documentation.name: artists_get_latest_release
documentation.description: Gets the latest release of an artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The ID of the artist. This is the value of the 'artist->adamid' field returned by various endpoints such as .../search, .../songs/v2/detect, or .../songs/get-details.

documentation.name: mouldinformation
documentation.description: Retrieves mould information for a given tenant ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

tenantid.description: The ID of the tenant for which mould information is to be retrieved.

documentation.name: shorten
documentation.description: Shortens a given long URL using the Bitly API and returns the shortened URL or an error message.

longurl.description: The long URL to be shortened.

documentation.name: letters
documentation.description: Finds possible words from the given Boggle board letters using the RapidAPI Codebox Boggle endpoint.

letters.description: A string representing the letters on the Boggle board.

documentation.name: get_laws_for_one_state
documentation.description: Retrieves gun law documentation links for a specific U.S. state using the provided RapidAPI key.

documentation.name: annotation_versions
documentation.description: Gets the versions of an annotation from the Genius Song Lyrics API.

is_id.description: The ID of the annotation.

text_format.description: Format for text bodies related to the annotation. Options include `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`. Defaults to `html`.

documentation.name: leagueseasons
documentation.description: Fetches the seasons of a handball tournament given its unique tournament ID.

tournamentid.description: The unique ID of the tournament for which to retrieve the league's seasons.

documentation.name: aliexpress_item_search
documentation.description: Searches for items on AliExpress based on various filters and criteria.

brandid.description: The brand ID to filter items by. Defaults to None.

catid.description: The category ID to filter items by. Defaults to None.

q.description: The search query. Defaults to 'iphone'.

page.description: The page number of the search results. Defaults to 1.

loc.description: The location to filter items by. Defaults to None.

locale.description: The locale to display titles and content in the selected language. Defaults to None.

endprice.description: The upper price limit to filter items by. Defaults to None.

sort.description: The sort order of the search results. Defaults to None.

attr.description: The attributes to filter items by, separated by semicolons. Defaults to None.

startprice.description: The lower price limit to filter items by. Defaults to None.

region.description: The region to get accurate shipping costs and promotions. Defaults to None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product prices in. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: get_word_by_length_start_and_contain
documentation.description: Fetches a random word from an API that matches specific criteria: a given length, starting substring, and containing another substring.

substring.description: The substring that the word must contain.

documentation.description: Transforms an mRNA sequence to its DNA sequence equivalent using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

mrna.description: The mRNA sequence to be transformed.

extended_publisher_details.description: If set to True, includes additional publisher details such as the website URL and favicon. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: get_all_verse_of_chapter_by_chapter_id
documentation.description: Fetches all verses from a specific chapter in the Bhagavad Gita by chapter ID.

documentation.name: search_airport

documentation.name: get_general_game_information
documentation.description: Retrieves the most general information for a specified NBA game, including away team, home team, game date, and game start time. All times are in Eastern (ET) time zone.

gameid.description: The unique identifier for the NBA game. This can be retrieved from calls like `getNBAGamesForDate` or `getNBATeamSchedule`.

documentation.name: featuredtournamentsevents
documentation.description: Fetches featured events for a given unique tournament from the Sportify API.

documentation.name: searchstation
documentation.description: Search for radio stations based on a provided keyword.

order.description: The order in which to display the results. Use 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Default is 'ASC'.

page.description: The page number of the results to display. Default is 1.

limit.description: The limit of items to display per page. Default is 10.

documentation.name: getmindfulnessquote
documentation.description: Fetches a random mindfulness quote, optionally filtered by author or category.

category.description: The category of the quote. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: get_campaign_from_url

documentation.name: locations_search
documentation.description: Searches for locations based on a given term or phrase using the SeLoger API.

documentation.name: getlearningresources_topic
documentation.description: Fetch Power BI learning resources based on a specific topic and page number.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.

documentation.name: cars_detail
documentation.description: Fetches detailed information about a car model for a given year using the Consumer Reports API.

documentation.name: object_detection
documentation.description: Detects various objects in an image through the Google Lens API, providing bounding boxes, labels/types, and confidence scores.

documentation.name: get_contacts
documentation.description: Retrieves all contacts using the provided API key and returns the response in either JSON or CSV format.

json.description: Specifies whether to return the response in JSON format. If not provided, the response will be in CSV format.

documentation.name: swift_code
documentation.description: Fetches and returns the details of a specified SWIFT code using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

swift_code.description: The SWIFT code for which the details are to be retrieved.

colisid.description: The ID of the package to be tracked.

documentation.name: retorna_dados_do_endere_o_atrav_s_do_cep

documentation.description: Retrieves a raster map tile with English labels from the MapTiles API.

documentation.description: Fetches search suggestions for cryptocurrencies, exchanges, and markets based on a query.

referencecurrencyuuid.description: UUID of the reference currency for price calculations. Defaults to 'yhjMzLPhuIDl' (US Dollar).

documentation.description: Retrieves a list of religions using the specified method through the Matrimony Profiles API.

method.description: The method parameter to be used in the API request.

documentation.name: qr_code_gen
documentation.description: Generates a QR code for the given URL using the Simple Cheap QR Code Generator API.

url.description: The URL for which to generate the QR code.

documentation.name: get_wagons_mrt_train_no_wagons_get
documentation.description: Fetches the number of wagons for a given MRT train using the RapidAPI service.

documentation.name: get_app_reviews
documentation.description: Fetches app reviews from the iOS store for a given app.

sort.description: Controls sorting options in the iOS store. Valid values are 'helpful' or 'recent'.

country.description: The country code for the iOS store to fetch reviews from.

page.description: The page number of the reviews to fetch.

appid.description: The ID of the app for which to fetch reviews.

documentation.name: etablissements_d_une_entreprise
documentation.description: Fetch the establishments of a company in New Caledonia using the RID provided.

rid.description: The unique identifier (RID) of the company.

documentation.name: search_nearby
documentation.description: Search for businesses near specific geographic coordinates using various query parameters.

query.description: The search query or keyword (e.g., 'Bars and pubs', 'Plumbers').

lng.description: Longitude of the geographic coordinates to search nearby.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinates to search nearby.

x_user_agent.description: Device type for the search. Default is 'desktop'.

language.description: Language of the results. Default is 'en'. For a list of supported language codes, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes.

subtypes.description: Specific subtypes of businesses to search for, specified as a comma-separated list (e.g., 'Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician').

fields.description: A comma-separated list of business fields to include in the response. By default, all fields are returned (e.g., 'business_id,type,phone_number,full_address').

limit.description: Maximum number of businesses to return (1-500). Default is '20'.

region.description: Region or country code to query Google Maps from. Default is 'us'. For a list of supported region/country codes, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes.

documentation.name: get_answer_to_question
documentation.description: Fetches the answer to a given question from the Question Answered API using the provided RapidAPI key.

questionasked.default: how far away is the sun from earth?

documentation.name: products_types_typeid_locations
documentation.description: Fetches a list of locations that have issued products for a given product type.

typeid.description: The ID of a valid product type.

documentation.name: domain_information
documentation.description: Fetches domain information such as IP address, expiration date, and more using the WHOIS lookup API.

search.description: The domain to search (e.g., "google.com"). Note that "http://" or "https://" should not be included.

documentation.name: specific_publication_articles
documentation.description: Fetches news articles from a specific publication using the provided newspaper ID.

newspaperid.description: The ID of the newspaper to fetch articles from.

documentation.name: records
documentation.description: Fetches records data from the Goverlytics API based on various optional filtering criteria.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The starting point in the list of records to return. Defaults to None.

substring.description: A substring to search for within the records. Defaults to None.

speaker_id.description: An ID representing a specific speaker. Defaults to None.

topic.description: The topic to filter records by. Defaults to None.

speaker_party.description: The party affiliation of the speaker to filter by. Defaults to None.

level_of_government.description: The level of government to filter records by. Defaults to None.

region.description: The region to filter records by. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: adosc
documentation.description: Fetches the Chaikin A/D Oscillator (ADOSC) indicator data for a given financial instrument.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supports `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

slow_period.description: Length of the slow EMA period. Defaults to 26.

fast_period.description: Length of the fast EMA period. Defaults to 12.

format.description: Output format, can be either `CSV` or `JSON`. Defaults to `json`.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Defaults to 30.

documentation.name: teams_get_squad
documentation.description: Retrieves the squad information for a specific team based on the given team ID.

teamid.description: The ID of the team. This value is typically obtained from the 'id' field returned in various API endpoints such as /teams/search, /matches/detail, /tournaments/get-featured-events, /tournaments/get-scheduled-events, or /tournaments/get-top-teams.

documentation.name: stock_v2_get_valuation
documentation.description: Fetches the valuation data for a given stock using its performance ID.

performanceid.description: The value of the performanceId field from endpoints like /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers. It specifies the stock for which to fetch the valuation data.

documentation.name: get_token_price_history_between_dates
documentation.description: Retrieves the price history of a token between two specified dates in USD.

startdate.description: The starting unix timestamp (in seconds) for the price history.

chainid.description: The specific network the desired token resides on.

address.description: The address of the desired token.

enddate.description: The ending unix timestamp (in seconds) for the price history.

documentation.name: shorts_sound_attribution
documentation.description: Fetches the Shorts original sound attribution listing from the YouTube API.

x_cachebypass.description: Cache bypass value, must be set to '1' if used.

lang.description: Language code for localized results, such as 'en', 'gb', 'hi', etc.

geo.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region, such as 'US' (default), 'UK', 'CA', 'IN', etc.

params.description: Attribution parameter available in the Shorts info endpoint; defaults to a specific encoded string.

token.description: Pagination token for retrieving additional results.

is_id.description: Shorts video ID to be provided if the params value is not available.

documentation.name: snap_to_road
documentation.description: Snaps a given geographical coordinate to the nearest road.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographical coordinate.

lon.description: Longitude of the geographical coordinate.

apikey.description: API key for authenticating with the MyMappi service.

documentation.name: getzip
documentation.description: Fetch town information based on a provided ZIP code (Postleitzahl) using the RapidAPI.

zip.description: The ZIP code for which to fetch town information.

documentation.name: validate_phonenumber
documentation.description: Validates a phone number using the WhatsApp Checker Pro API.

phone.description: The phone number to be validated.

documentation.name: real_time_hashtag_search
documentation.description: Searches for live hashtags on social media based on a given keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for related hashtags.

documentation.name: alerts_and_jams

bottom_left.description: Latitude, longitude pair defining the bottom-left corner of the geographic area.

max_alerts.description: Maximum number of alerts to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching alerts.

max_jams.description: Maximum number of traffic jams to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching traffic jams.

documentation.name: between_checker
documentation.description: Checks if a given date is between two specified dates using the DateClock API.

to.description: The end date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

date.description: The date to check in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

is_from.description: The start date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

documentation.name: price_forecasts
documentation.description: Fetches an AI-generated price forecast for a given stock symbol over the next 3 months using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which the price forecast is to be generated.

documentation.name: distance
documentation.description: Calculates the geodesic and great circle distances between two geographic points specified by their latitude and longitude coordinates.

documentation.name: get_quotes_by_anime_title
documentation.description: Fetches quotes from a specified anime title using the Anime Quotes API.

title.description: The title of the anime for which to fetch quotes. Defaults to 'Fairy Tail'.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to '1'.

documentation.name: get_annonce
documentation.description: Fetches advertisement details from the FluxImmo API based on a unique identifier.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier of the advertisement to fetch.

documentation.name: evaluate
documentation.description: Evaluates a mathematical expression using the given variables and their values through the RapidAPI service.

variables.description: A comma-separated string listing the variables used in the expression.

values.description: A comma-separated string listing the values corresponding to the variables.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to be evaluated.

documentation.name: check_text
documentation.description: Submits text for analysis to determine if it was generated by a machine or a human using the AI Detection API.

term.description: The text to be analyzed. Do not include any special characters.
term.default: Text you think is generated by AI

documentation.name: organic_results
documentation.description: Fetches JSON data of organic search results from Google using the RapidAPI service.

query.description: Search query string.

device.description: Device type for the search results, e.g. 'desktop', 'mobile'. Defaults to 'desktop'.

hl.description: Language for the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

html.description: HTML content toggle. Defaults to None.

duration.description: Duration filter, e.g. 'd', 'w', 'm', 'y'. Defaults to None.

lr.description: Language restrict parameter. Defaults to None.

safe.description: Safe search filter. Defaults to None.

uule.description: Encoded location parameter. Defaults to None.

nfpr.description: No forced personalized results toggle. Defaults to '0'.

num.description: Number of search results to return. Defaults to '10'.

tbs.description: Search filter tools, e.g. 'qdr:h', 'li:1'. Defaults to None.

gl.description: Geolocation for the search results. Defaults to 'us'.

page.description: Page number of the search results. Defaults to '0'.

documentation.name: coins_get_historical_data
documentation.description: Fetch historical data for a specific cryptocurrency pair from a given date range.

lang_id.description: Language ID as returned by the get-meta-data endpoint. Default is 1.

time_utc_offset.description: Time offset from UTC in seconds. Default is 28800 (UTC+8).

interval.description: Interval of the data points. Allowed values are 'day', 'week', or 'month'. Default is 'day'.

documentation.name: aliexpress_item_detail_3
documentation.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific AliExpress item.

currency.description: Currency for displaying the product price. Only supported currencies are accepted.

region.description: Region for accurate shipping costs and promotions. Only supported regions are accepted.

locale.description: Locale for displaying titles and content in the desired language. Only supported locales are accepted.

documentation.name: series_get_points_table
documentation.description: Fetch the points table for a given series using the Cricbuzz API.

seriesid.description: The unique identifier of the cricket series for which the points table is to be fetched.

documentation.name: tangga_lagu
documentation.description: Fetches the top tracks from the specified music chart.

index.description: The starting index of the track list.

num.description: The number of tracks to retrieve.

lang.description: The language of the tracks.

country.description: The country of the music chart.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the specific music chart.

documentation.name: get_product_details_all_countries
documentation.description: Fetches the details of a specific product from Amazon using its ASIN code, for a given language and country code.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product.

languagecode.description: The language code for the product details. Defaults to 'EN'.

countrycode.description: The country code for the Amazon site to query. Defaults to 'US'.

documentation.name: game_predictions
documentation.description: Fetch game predictions using specified parameters.

timezone.description: The timezone name.

competitors.description: The competitor ID, if applicable. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: trending_charts
documentation.description: Fetches the trending videos chart for a specified region on YouTube.

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include.

regioncode.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'UK' for United Kingdom, 'CA' for Canada, 'IN' for India).

chart.description: The chart parameter specifies the chart to retrieve (e.g., 'mostPopular').

x_cachebypass.description: The cache bypass value; must be '1' to bypass cache. Defaults to None.

documentation.name: eomonth
documentation.description: Computes and returns the date of the last day of a given month based on a specified start date and the number of months to adjust.

months.description: The number of months before or after the start date. A positive value results in a future date, while a negative value results in a past date.

start_date.description: The start date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), with or without time information.

documentation.name: address_postal_code
documentation.description: Fetch address information based on the given postal code and additional parameters.

postal_code.description: Postal code string (minimum: 3 digits, maximum: 7 digits).

datum.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude (default: 'wgs84'). Possible values are 'wgs84' for World Geodetic System and 'tokyo' for Old Japan Geodetic System.

offset.description: Skips a given number of first data (minimum value: 0, maximum value: 2000, default: 0).

coord_unit.description: The unit of latitude and longitude in the output data. Possible values are 'degree' for decimal system of degrees (default) and 'millisec' for milliseconds.

limit.description: Limits the number of response data (minimum value: 1, maximum value: 100, default: 10).

documentation.name: macronutrient_distribution
documentation.description: Calculates the optimal distribution of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats) based on dietary preferences, body composition goals, and activity level.

dietary_preferences.description: Represents the individual's dietary choices or restrictions, such as 'vegetarian', 'vegan', 'pescatarian', or 'gluten-free'.

body_composition_goal.description: The body composition goal, which can be 'weight_loss', 'maintenance', or 'muscle_gain'.

activity_level.description: The activity level of the individual, which can be 'sedentary', 'moderately_active', or 'very_active'.

documentation.name: bsa
documentation.description: Calculates the Body Surface Area (BSA) based on weight and height using an external API.

weightinkilograms.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

heightincentrimetres.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

documentation.name: team_schedule
documentation.description: Fetches the schedule of fixtures for a given soccer team across all tournaments it participates in.

teamid.description: The unique identifier of the soccer team.

documentation.name: athlete_trophy_stats
documentation.description: Retrieve the trophy statistics for a specified athlete in a specified competition.

athleteid.description: The unique identifier of the athlete.

competitionid.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

timezone.description: The timezone to be used for displaying results.

langid.description: The language id for the output.

documentation.name: mrna2aminoacid
documentation.description: Transforms an mRNA sequence into a sequence of Amino Acids using the RapidAPI service.

mrna.description: The mRNA sequence to be converted to an Amino Acid sequence.

documentation.name: top_paid_mac_apps
documentation.description: Retrieves a list of the top paid Mac apps from the App Store.

category.description: Category of the apps to retrieve. Default is '6016'.

country.description: Country code to filter the app results. Default is 'us'.

lang.description: Language code for the results. Default is 'en'.

num.description: Number of results to return. Default is 100. Maximum is 200.

documentation.name: youtube_emb_link
documentation.description: Fetches YouTube embed link information using the given URL and RapidAPI key.

url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to fetch information for. Defaults to 'https://www.youtube.com/embed/OA9zy0BLm9g'.

documentation.name: retrieving_events
documentation.description: Retrieve a list of events for assets tracked by OpenSea using the OpenSea Data Query API.

collection_slug.description: The slug of the collection to filter events by.

auction_type.description: The type of auction to filter events by.

asset_contract_address.description: The contract address of the asset. Defaults to '0x4372f4d950d30c6f12c7228ade77d6cc019404c9'.

token_id.description: The token ID of the asset. Defaults to 309.

occurred_after.description: Unix timestamp to filter events that occurred after this time.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

account_address.description: The account address to filter events by.

occurred_before.description: Unix timestamp to filter events that occurred before this time. Defaults to 1644800000.

only_opensea.description: Whether to restrict results to OpenSea only events.

event_type.description: The type of event to filter by (e.g., 'transfer', 'successful').

documentation.name: feed_hot
documentation.description: Fetches hot feed data from the specified API.

kapi_proxy.description: Proxy for the kapi endpoint. Default is None.

country.description: Country code for the feed. Default is 'ma'.

count.description: Number of items to fetch. Default is '30'.

language.description: Language code for the feed. Default is 'en'.

pcursor.description: Cursor for pagination. Default is None.

documentation.name: athlete_large_image
documentation.description: Fetches the large image for a specific athlete in the PNG format.

athleteid.description: The ID of the athlete whose large image is to be fetched.

imageversion.description: The version of the image to be fetched.

documentation.name: gera_comprovante_rfb
documentation.description: Generates a certificate from Receita Federal in PDF format.

taxid.description: The tax identification number to be used for generating the certificate.

pages.description: A comma-separated string specifying which pages to include in the certificate. Default is 'REGISTRATION,MEMBERS'.

documentation.name: website_url_qr_code
documentation.description: Generates a static QR code (standard or custom-designed) encoded with the specified URL and customization options using the Scanova QR Code API.

error_correction.description: Specifies error correction level. Default is 'H'.

eye_pattern.description: Specifies the eye pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT_RECT'.

data_gradient_style.description: Specifies the gradient style for the data modules. Default is 'None'.

format.description: Specifies the format of the QR code image. Default is 'png'.

size.description: Specifies the size of the QR code image. Default is 'm'.

eye_color_outer.description: Specifies the outer color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_end_color.description: Specifies the end color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_start_color.description: Specifies the start color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

eye_color_inner.description: Specifies the inner color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code. Default is 'https://scanova.io'.

data_pattern.description: Specifies the data pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT'.

background_color.description: Specifies the background color of the QR code. Default is '#FFFFFF'.

documentation.name: v1_aggregation
documentation.description: Aggregates news article counts based on specified search criteria and time intervals.

q.description: The search query string, which must be URL-encoded.

country.description: The country to narrow the search to, specified using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. This parameter is experimental and recommended to be used with the `lang` parameter.

topic.description: The topic to filter articles by. Accepted values include `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`, `beauty`, `travel`, `music`, `food`, `science`. This parameter is experimental.

sources.description: Comma-separated string of news sources to filter the search. Example: `nytimes.com,cnn.com`.

agg_by.description: Aggregation interval for the results. Accepts `day` (default) or `hour`.

to_rank.description: Upper boundary of the rank of news websites to filter the search.

media.description: When set to `True`, includes `media` and `media_content` fields in the output which provide information about images associated with the articles.

lang.description: The language to filter the search. Acceptable values include language codes like `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, etc.

not_sources.description: Comma-separated string of sources to exclude from the search. Example: `nytimes.com,cnn.com`.

to.description: The end date and time to search until, in UTC. Various date formats are accepted.

ranked_only.description: Limit the search to sources that are in the top 1 million online websites. Default is `True`.

is_from.description: The start date and time to search from, in UTC. Various date formats are accepted. The default is set to one week ago at midnight UTC.

search_in.description: Defines where to search the provided query (in `title`, `summary`, or both). Default is both.

from_rank.description: Lower boundary of the rank of news websites to filter the search. Lower rank indicates higher popularity.

documentation.name: locationsuggestions_v2

documentation.name: minutely
documentation.description: Fetches minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for the next 60 minutes, updated in real-time using AI nowcasting models.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. Used to specify the location. If not provided, use `lat` and `lon`. Defaults to None.

timezone.description: Timezone for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. Formats like 'Europe/Prague' or 'UTC' can be used, or 'auto' to use local timezone. Defaults to 'auto'.

lat.description: Latitude of the location. Specify in formats like '12N', '12.3N', '12.3', or '-13.4'. Defaults to '37.81021'.

language.description: Language for text summaries. Available languages are 'en' (default), 'es', 'fr', 'de', 'pl', 'cs'. Defaults to 'en'.
